title: Looking for a Plat+ coach/duo buddy
body:
Hi guys, currently in Gold 2, got to Plat 1 last season but having difficulty getting back into Plat (keep of failing my promos). Hence why I'm looking for someone to duo with me and maybe give me some tips to help get back to Plat. I'm happy to gift you some skins or something, basically just really want to get back to Plat and be more confident in carrying.

Add me on my main if you're interested: iamthefox

replies.body: No, I doubt anyone could actually teach me anything useful for solo queue
So you're looking for a coach but then they wont teach you anything. My hero.
Can play anything if you are in Plat as you won't be able to que with me if you're Gold..
Well that's why I was asking for a Plat person, was hoping maybe a Diamond player with a smurf could help

> [{quoted}](name=CrepeVictim,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=E7Epgo3z,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-04-28T16:10:23.259+0000)
>
> Well that's why I was asking for a Plat person, was hoping maybe a Diamond player with a smurf could help

So you're basically asking to get boosted to plat...
No I'm asking for someone that's decent, to duo with me so I can at least not be on a team full of potoatoes
